meanings.definition: The quality of being graceful and stylish in appearance or manner.
meanings.sent1: Her elegancy in the way she walked across the room caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The ballerina's elegancy on stage mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent3: Despite his clumsiness, he tried to mimic her elegancy but ended up tripping over his own feet.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with an elegancy that words could not describe.
meanings.sent5: The old mansion exuded an air of elegancy and charm.

meanings.definition: Refinement and sophistication in design or style.
meanings.sent1: The hotel lobby was decorated with an elegancy that reflected luxury and class.
meanings.sent2: The designer's collection showcased an elegancy that set it apart from the rest.
meanings.sent3: The cat strutted around the room with an elegancy that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The garden was arranged with an elegancy that seemed to defy nature.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity of her outfit added an unexpected touch of elegancy to the event.
